error_boundary.title: Oops! Something went wrong.
error_boundary.description: We are sorry for the inconvenience. Please try again later.

text.scan_des: Scan documents anytime, anywhere – right from your pocket!
text.scan_second_des: Turn your phone into a portable scanner, helping you store documents in just a few seconds.
text.scan_third_des: Export documents in multiple formats and share instantly via email, messenger or the cloud.
text.no_data_des: Sync docs accross smartphones, tablets, and computers
